name: PillTimer
tagline: A basic iOS app to manage medicine doses
body:
### Introducing PillTimer

This is an app to keep track of medicine doses. Blah blah lorem ipsum dolor sit ametagashi.

### Screenshots

![You may take a dose now](http://s3.eph.me/pilltimer/3-Yes.PNG) ![You may not take a dose now](http://s3.eph.me/pilltimer/3-No.PNG) ![Record a new dose](http://s3.eph.me/pilltimer/3-New.PNG) ![Settings](http://s3.eph.me/pilltimer/3-Back.PNG)
### About

This app was built as a personal exercise by [Evan Hildreth](http://eph.me/) (a.k.a. [oddEvan](http://www.oddevan.com/)) and beta-tested by his amazing wife [Brittany Hildreth](http://twitter.com/britthildreth).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
